BEFORE:
tree = ParentedTree.fromstring(
            '(S (NP (DT the) (JJ big) (NN dog)) '
            '(VP bit) (NP (DT a) (NN cat)))')
        self.assertEqual(tgrep.tgrep_positions(tree, 'NN'),
                         [(0,2), (2,1)])
        self.assertEqual(tgrep.tgrep_nodes(tree, 'NN'),
                         [tree[0,2], tree[2,1]])
        self.assertEqual(tgrep.tgrep_positions(tree, 'NN|JJ'),
                         [(0, 1), (0, 2), (2, 1)])
AFTER:
tree = ParentedTree.fromstring(
            '(S (NP (DT the) (JJ big) (NN dog)) '
            '(VP bit) (NP (DT a) (NN cat)))')
        self.assertEqual(list(tgrep.tgrep_positions([tree], 'NN')),
                         [[(0,2), (2,1)]])
        self.assertEqual(list(tgrep.tgrep_nodes([tree], 'NN')),
                         [[tree[0,2], tree[2,1]]])
        self.assertEqual(list(tgrep.tgrep_positions([tree], 'NN|JJ')),
                         [[(0, 1), (0, 2), (2, 1)]])
